title: Sam's takeaway style curry sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon turmeric', '1 tablespoon paprika', '2 tablespoons crushed garlic', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh root ginger', '2 large onions, chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tin water (use the empty tomato tin to measure)', 'chilli powder to taste', '1 tablespoon salt, or to taste']
